ISSUE.TITLE: [DISCUSS] Do we need to keep `k8s_deployment_info` in Upstream?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We originally hoped to save some k8s deployment information so that some third-party tools can maintain Upstream nodes based on this information. But at present, few people use it, and it is easy to cause misunderstanding. So I wonder if this part should be removed now. What do you think? Thanks.
